thread.title: Gisele celebrates immigration in latest Instagram post - Boston.com
thread.title_full: Gisele celebrates immigration in latest Instagram post - Boston.com

title: Gisele celebrates immigration in latest Instagram post - Boston.com
text:
Gisele celebrates immigration in latest Instagram post Gisele celebrates immigration in latest Instagram post "#weareallimmigrants" John Waller 6:36 PM 
Tom Brady may be trying to stay out of politics ahead of Super Bowl 51, but the same can’t be said of his wife Gisele Bundchen. 
Bundchen, a Brazil native, celebrated the power of immigration in an Instagram post Wednesday, less than a week after President Donald Trump’s executive order made it a hot-button issue. A photo posted by Gisele Bündchen (@gisele) on Feb 1, 2017 at 12:14pm PST 
“The beauty of the human race is in its diversity. We are all connected and we are stronger when we come together. Only ego, beliefs and fears separate us. #weareone #weareallimmigrants #morelove ,” she wrote. Advertisement
